item.title: Stats Joke
item.description: A: Cueball: I used to think correlation implied causation. A: Then I took a statistics class. Now I don’t. B: Sounds like the class helped. A: Well, maybe.
item.content: A: Cueball: I used to think correlation implied causation. A: Then I took a statistics class. Now I don’t. B: Sounds like the class helped. A: Well, maybe.
